short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension Replaces all images with images of cats

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces all images with random pictures of cats! No need to click the button, this works automatically on each page you load. To see pages normally again simple disable the extension until your ready for more Cats.
